Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-46712 affecting package erlang for versions less than 25.3.2.21-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-46712 affecting package erlang for versions less than 25.3.2.21-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package erlang is earlier than 25.3.2.21-1, affected by CVE-2025-46712
